# [Interview #1139: Shadows of Self-BYU, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1139#11)

#### CoinShooter

If you steelpush/ironpull on a computer's hard drive, what would happen?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It would screw it up.
